mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_users (user_id, business_name, owner_name, business_number, role, status, company_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{businessName}, #{ownerName}, #{businessNumber}, #{role}, #{status}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.email, u.nickname FROM business_users b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.company_id = #{companyId} AND b.role = 'BRANCH' AND b.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY u.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE business_users SET status = #{status} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.email, u.nickname FROM business_users b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.role = 'HQ' AND (u.email = #{identifier} OR b.company_id = #{identifier}) LIMIT 1
